column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ray - Thanks for your review. I have spoken to the bar staff about this incident and on their behalf
column2: I regret this incident happened. I can assure you it was not intentional
column3: but a mistake is still a mistake and we will work harder to prevent this from happening in the future. That said
column4: when our foyer does get too crowded
column5: many guests will prefer to wait at Piola or on the sidewalk. Most importantly
column6: I am pleased you enjoyed your meal and that our servers took care of you and your party adequately.
